explains: n. 畸形；畸形的人或物；道德方面的缺陷

sentences.en: Drugs taken during pregnancy may cause physical deformity in babies.
sentences.cn: 妊娠期服用的药物可能引起婴儿身体畸形。

sentences.en: The game was forgotten in the entertainment of Philip's deformity.
sentences.cn: 在取笑菲利普的残疾的时候，他把比赛抛诸脑后。

sentences.en: The object of these movements is to prevent stiffness or deformity of joints.
sentences.cn: 这些活动的目的是防止关节僵硬或变形。
